overview: He's baaack... and he's horny!" "From the producers of the mega-hits The Da Vinci Load, BeTwinked, and Oliver Twink comes this erotic gay fuck film without the usual PZP campiness. Aaron Tyler returns as a mischievous ghost, and hunky Sean Preston is the only man who can see him. For he is The Twink Whisperer. This story of young love spans over 80 years, from the Roaring '20s to the present. In that time our naughty little imp haunts a couple of greaser step-brothers in the Nifty '50s, two long-haired hippies in the Psychedelic '70s, straight business-school students in the Greedy '80s, and a bohemian psychic in the present. Will love finally allow him to go into the light and cross over... or will he stay earthbound and alone forever?
title: The Twink Whisperer
